mutants.code:
def sum_of_digits(n):
    num = abs(n)
    string_num = repr(num)
    length = len(string_num)
    sum = 1
    for index in range(length):
        char = string_num[index]
        digit = ord(char) - ord('0')
        sum = sum + digit
    if n < 0:
        sum = -sum
    return sum

    num = abs(n)

    length = len(string_num)

        sum = sum + digit

        sum = -sum
    return sum
